title: Powered by MDAnalysis

[![Powered by MDAnalysis](https://img.shields.io/badge/powered%20by-MDAnalysis-orange.svg?logoWidth=16&logo=data:image/x-icon;base64,)](https://www.mdanalysis.org)
We have created this nifty [Shields.io](https://shields.io/) badge for you to display on your MDAnalysis-using projects!

By showcasing your use of MDAnalysis you are

* Helping to spread the love ‚ù§Ô∏è and strengthening the MDAnalysis user community
* Rewarding our open-source effort and boosting our dev team's motivation üòä
* Providing a non-intrusive way for us to know our user-base &mdash; increasingly relevant in raising funds for development

The above points all lead to happier users and devs, and ultimately to a better MDAnalysis overall üí™

So just choose from our available [badge-embedding markup examples]({{ site.baseurl }}/pages/citations/#powered-by-mdanalysis) and start spreading the word today!
